paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our team has a wealth of experience and deep understanding of New York's legal landscape.

detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: We provide top-quality legal representation with a personalized approach to each case.

detailsData.title: Million-Dollar Settlements
detailsData.content: With a history of million-dollar settlements, we strive for the best outcomes for our clients.

detailsData.title: Dedicated Advocates
detailsData.content: Our attorneys are dedicated advocates for justice, fighting tirelessly for the rights of our clients.

address: 1 Cross Island Plaza Suite 203C, Queens, NY 11422
valueProp: At Gregory Spektor & Associates P.C., our team of professional attorneys is highly recommended for their wealth of experience and a deep understanding of New York's legal landscape. We specialize in handling catastrophic and traumatic injury cases including automobile crashes and construction accident litigation, slip and fall on commercial property, wrongful death claims, medical malpractice, premise liability claims, and personal injury cases throughout New York.
topics: New York City Slip And Fall Lawyer

testimonalData.text: Matt is my go-to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Matt is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Matt and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
